titleStmt.title: A souldiers vvish vnto his soveraigne lord King Iames
titleStmt.author: Pricket, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Harison, and are to be sold in Pater noster row, at the signe of the Grewhound [sic],
